google_play_reviews.content: The app does something that, for some reason, Google refuses to let you do with your contacts birthdays. It lets you add custom reminders. It does what it's supposed to do in a very nice and simple way. I highly recommend it!
Wowie wow. Best app.

It's not what I expected. I was looking for a notebook app where I can just write in people's names and birthdays. (Like an address book) This app isn't the easiest to work with. I started putting names in alphabetically then the app switched my list putting the names by birthday month which confused me at first. It may not work for me but it may work out for someone else.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Birday is a timeline, and the events are shown in temporal order. It should be the most intuitive organization, but I'll see if I can add different ordering logic in the next update. By the way, I respect your opinion, but since this app is free and ad free, and does what it should do, why rate it 2 stars just because it's not what you expected?

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you for this excellent app. Feature request: auto import from contacts. Ty!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It's already available, in experimental settings!

google_play_reviews.content: Good
Really simple, to the point and no ads app. Love it. Great job!
So far so good for. Got all my people in and scheduled a 5 day advance reminder. That gives me plenty of time to get a card in the mail.
Only just started using the app.. So far so good..
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! I hope to deserve the fifth star with the next updates!

google_play_reviews.content: Great app, very fast (no lag) and nice design, does its job

Happy with it overall, exactly what I needed. The only thing was I wanted to import data using a csv file and I couldn't find the correct format anywhere. Ended up doing it manually. But - now I can export using the app backup and that's great.
Excellent app. Simple, easy use, clean code and NO ADS (yay). I'd give it seven stars of I could!
Literally the BEST birthday app you could ask for!!!! 100% free with 0 ads, and super easy UI. Thank you for making this!!!!!
Reallly gooooodd
This app is amazing. I recommend it to literally all my friends
Should have a login to save data across devices! Then would be absolutely perfect!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Birday can automatically sync your data with Google drive if you enabled it from system settings! And, you can backup them in various formats too! I hope to deserve the fifth star with the next updates!

google_play_reviews.content: Nice
This app I ever seen

Best birthday/events managing app with a clean interface that is easy to use. It is supported by android beta themed icons and it has nice looking widgets. Super solid app. 100% recommend downloading.

Hello developer, I loved this app, only thing that i think this app lacks in is system accent. you should try increasing color options, or i would recommend a hex code or such for a user to pick accent color of his choice. thank you!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: From Android 12 onwards, Birday has the "Monet" option. With this mode enabled, Birday will have the same colors of the os, using the new "material you" feature from Google. For static accents i decided to choose only specific colors to avoid unreadable elements, but I'll add more in the future, don't worry üôÇ

google_play_reviews.content: Why am I not receiving notifications?.. wow what a reply ... I had already disabled the battery optimisation. Whether the app is free or not, every user has the right to ask why is the app not working on his or her mobile properly. I had posted a question, not a negation.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Of course you can üôÇ but if you correctly disabled battery optimization the app should work, and i was surprised! Try to reboot and open Birday again, and let me know by email if it works. If not, I'll investigate your specific case since it never happened before üëç

google_play_reviews.content: I was looking for a simple app to track people's birthdays / anniversaries. This app is absolutely fantastic, compared to the usual commercialised, ad-ridden apps. It just does the job, nothing more, nothing less - what more could you want
Simple and really helpful for keeping track of big days over the year.
Great app. Very beautiful UI and really useful. I'd love the ability to export birthdays to another calender app.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The next release will feature a yearly overview! I should also work on some kind of calendar integration üôÇ thanks for the review!

google_play_reviews.content: What good is the "null" displayed for name fields that are empty? Like "null John Doe". I really would like this to disappear. My suggestion: Just use the available info, in the order it appears in Google Contacts. Otherwise, the app works well.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Birday needs a non-empty name field to work, for technical reasons. That's why it is forced to "null" when empty. I'll try to find a cleaner solution to deserve the fifth star!

google_play_reviews.content: Simple yet practical!

google_play_reviews.content: Does what it says in an aesthetically pleasing and functional way.

Does it's job and helps me keep track of events. Recommend üëç
It's really simple reminder app, not like it syncs with all your stuff or anything, but God damnit, it has saved me so many b-day I forgot, and I haven't had it for even a year!
Ad-free and open source, pretty design, useful app for someone like me who can never ever remember birthday date

Animations are very nice, and everything works perfectly, without any ads. The only thing I would add is an option for the app to notify me more than once before the day of actual event. google_play_reviews.content: Didn't remind me of the birthday. I opened the app and the birthday was there.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: This issue doesn't depend on Birday. Some devices kill the app automatically to save battery, pending it from sending notification. You can easily fix this disabling battery optimizations for Birday though! If you need help, send me an email!

google_play_reviews.content: Fantastic app. Does exactly what it says without bombarding you with adverts like similar apps Update after latest Birday update. Really hate the widget now. google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Well, before the update everybody hated the widget and now everybody loves it ._.

google_play_reviews.content: Simple, intuitive and works!
I love it. Simple. Ad free. Does exactly what I need, plus extra stats, and organization is great.

Would love to have Anniversarys, others etc and Calendar View. Also, notes on all Birthdays not just favourite. Also, stats that show days, months, years of age would be great to add to the profile view. Over all, It's a Fantastic app, Nice and clean looking as well. With the above ideas added it will be the best app of this type. AAA+ Thanks love your work.

I love it great Reminder

google_play_reviews.content: Wow

Great!

google_play_reviews.replyContent: The Cloud Sync it's already available, the app should backup its data automatically on your Google account! Regarding the widget, I'll work to improve it in future updates. Thanks for the review!

google_play_reviews.content: Great interface, import/export functionality is very useful!
Useful
Useful app
Really useful! Keeping track of birthdays is always hard but luckily this app let's you import birthdays from contacts.

I'm loving how easy it is to input dates! Just click on the date, no scrolling needed once you're in the right month! I only have 2 issues. I would love an "other" category for anniversaries and memorial dates. Most important how can I save my data? In other apps I lose everything when I buy a new phone. It's a lot of work getting all my dates in. If I have to reinstall this app do I have to start over? Thanks for a great ad free app!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad you like the app! You can backup your saved events and restore them everytime you want, just go to settings and tap on "export and share birthdays". Regarding the anniversaries and the "other" category, it's in the Todo list and I'll work on it soon üôÇ

google_play_reviews.replyContent: And I'm disappointed for your review :( you simply have to tap on the year to select a past date, you can't set a birthday in the future! If you need help send me an email but I assure you, the app works as it should!

google_play_reviews.content: So far so good.
Honestly, this should be baked into stock android by default. Super convenient and straight forward. Thanks!
The notifications sometimes do not work and only pops up when i open the app. Otherwise an overall good app to manage the important dates.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Your phone automatically kills Birday when it tries to send notifications! To avoid this, go in settings>applications>Birday>disable battery optimizations. If you need help, send me an email!

google_play_reviews.content: Well, I think this is one of the easiest 5 out of 5. The app is simple and does its job. This would already do the trick. But additionally it's also ad-free, visually stunning and open source. Definitely the best app out there for Birthday Management. Thanks a lot :D
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You're welcome, and thanks for the review! üôÇ

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you, awesome and helpful app! I love animated bird in notification.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Some restrictions are needed for the app to work properly (birthdays in the future for example, I can't show  "-1 years" and it makes no sense since nobody knows the exact date of birth before it happens. Or even the 101 years thing, it depends on the Android date picker). Regarding the other things, I can surely do something to deserve more stars!

google_play_reviews.content: Very intuitive app to have. It does what it says.

google_play_reviews.content: Simple but very functional and reliable, with clean and minimal interface. Plus, it's ad-free which is a very nice thing.

Got it, thanks!! GREAT app and very responsive developer!! :) Former comment: Good app but please add a way to easily include the year with each birthday. Right now with Android I seem to have to scroll back through each month to go back years when entering birthdays manually and that is too difficult to do for someone not born in the last few years.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There is already! When you select the date, Just tap on the year in the upper left corner, and you can easily select it from the list! If you need help, send me an email! And thanks for reviewing!

google_play_reviews.content: If I want to set a date I think it should be ahead, but your calendar does not allow me to set date ahead it only show previous dates, you app I can't say is still useful for me,wish you can do something about it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You simply can't set a birthday for the future! Tap on the year to choose the correct year and select any date you want! The next date for the birthday is calculated automatically obviously. If you need help, send me an email!

google_play_reviews.content: Elegant, clean , beautiful, adfree... Wonderful package.. google_play_reviews.replyContent: Each contact is identified using the name and the birthdate, so if the birthdate changes Birday will consider the contact another contact. Regarding your suggestion, i don't save the phone numbers in the app for security reasons, and i can't do that at the moment. Thanks for the review!
